issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

TiStudio is treating the "-" as error, so the user experience when opening the project is one of immediatelty encountering an issue (though its a minor one).

seems like we can work around this by renaming the project without using a "-" (or other illegal char)

{html}
fields.summary: ks-ipad + tiStud - issues with "illegal" char in name

comments.body:
{html}

KitchenSink-iPad is now in its own repo as KitchenSinkiPad

{html}
